page.title: 19SURVEY QUESTIONNAIRE (cont)
page.content: 8 WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE LEISURE ACTIVITY? CAN YOU FOLLOW IT IN DOUNE ITSELF? {We found that in general people had {hobbies connected with the {countryside:}gardening,fishing,bird watching,bowling,cycling,hillwalking, jogging,horse riding,photography;as well as indoor hobbies like sewing, knitting and flower-arranging. This tied in with what people told us about their reasons for choosing to live in Doune,namely that it is quiet and peaceful. { The most urgently needed amenity}was held to be a sports centre/swimming- pool,cafe or type of laid on entertainment, and last but not least a village policeman.
